# Performance Optimizer

## Overview
Identify and fix performance bottlenecks in your code.

## Activation
Activates when user mentions "slow", "performance", "optimize", "speed up", or "bottleneck".

## Instructions

1. Identify performance issues:
   - Unnecessary re-renders (React)
   - N+1 queries (databases)
   - Memory leaks
   - Blocking operations
   - Inefficient algorithms

2. Suggest optimizations:
   - Memoization
   - Lazy loading
   - Caching
   - Debouncing/throttling
   - Algorithm improvements

3. Provide before/after with impact estimates

## Examples

**Input:** "this loop is slow"
```javascript
const result = [];
for (const item of items) {
  if (users.find(u => u.id === item.userId)) {
    result.push(item);
  }
}
```

**Output:**
```javascript
// O(n*m) â†’ O(n+m) using Set lookup
const userIds = new Set(users.map(u => u.id));
const result = items.filter(item => userIds.has(item.userId));
```

**Impact:** ~100x faster for large arrays
